required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Significance of Circulating Tumour Cells in Resectable Lung Cancer Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Significance of Circulating Tumour Cells in Resectable Lung Cancer Patients

lead_sponsor.agency: The Institute of Molecular and Translational Medicine, Czech Republic

clinical_study.source: The Institute of Molecular and Translational Medicine, Czech Republic

brief_summary.textblock: To determine whether the presence of circulating/disseminated tumour cells (CTCs/DTCs) in the blood and bone marrow of the resectable lung cancer (NSCLC) patients is a negative prognostic factor, and to find correlations with other clinical/pathological disease characteristics.

primary_outcome.measure: CEA, EGFR, LunX, c-met and EpCAM mRNA positive circulating tumour cells in lung cancer patients
primary_outcome.description: The absolute gene expression of CEA, EGFR, LunX, c-met and EpCAM mRNA positive circulating tumour cells(CTCs) isolated from peripheral blood, tumour draining blood and bone marrow samples of lung cancer patients will be measured using real-time RT-PCR method. The gene expression will be normalized per microgram of total mRNA.

secondary_outcome.measure: Cancer specific survival in CTC positive NSCLC patients
secondary_outcome.description: The cancer specific survival, overall survival and disease free survival will be measured from the time of diagnosis to the time of event. Two groups of patients will be compared: A: Patients with the presence of CTCs in peripheral blood, tumour draining blood and bone marrow before NSCLC surgery as described in primary outcome measure. B: Patients with the absence e of CTCs in peripheral blood, tumour draining blood and bone marrow before NSCLC surgery as described in primary outcome measure.

intervention.description: The CTCs/DTCs will be detected and counted in peripheral blood, tumour draining blood and bone marrow samples.

biospec_descr.textblock: ctDNA from plasma blood samples. DNA and RNA from nucleated blood cells. DNA and RNA from tumour tissue.

study_pop.textblock: Patients with confirmed non-metastatic NSCLC undergoing radical surgery with curative intent.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Non-small cell lung cancer, non-metastatic
Exclusion Criteria:
Prior neoadjuvant chemoradiotherapy Prior lung cancer Cancer duplicity

overall_official.affiliation: Institute of Molecular and Translational Medicine, Faculty of Medicine and Dentistry, Palacky University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: The Institute of Molecular and Translational Medicine, Czech Republic

patient_data.ipd_description: The anonymized metadata will be publicly available after publishing the results.
